description:
The best word that I can use to describe Josh is A-D-O-R-A-B-L-E. He is such a cute straight boy and he was real nervous about doing this video. He wanted to do some pornos with his girlfriend, but they broke up so he decided to give it a try on his own.

He was real concerned about doing a good job for me. You can see in the video that he asks me lots of questions and really looks to me for direction (like where to shoot the cum on his chest). Well, it's a tough job, but somebody's gotta do it...
title: Josh
